Wind River ConversionCould you please send or email me copies of i the Guaranty dated as of by Enron Corp in favor of Lost Creek and ii the Guaranty dated as of by BR in favor of Lost Creek so that I can prepare the Guaranty Terminations to be executed in connection with the conversion Thanks Please call me at if you have any questions Sean

Wind River UCCs Cc with the Wind River conversion from construction loans to term loans attached please find drafts of the following documents Lost Creek UCC for filing with Texas Secretary of State Lost Creek UCC for filing with Delaware Secretary of State Lost Creek UCC for filing with Wyoming Secretary of State Lost Creek UCC for filing with County Clerk of Sweetwater County Wyoming In the interest of time the UCCs to be filed in Wyoming are being distributed prior to review by Holland Hart and remain subject to their comments The collateral description exhibit will follow Please feel free to call Jason Peters at or the undersigned at if you have any questions or comments or if we can be of further assistance SB UCCFinDOC UCCFinDOC UCCLosDOC UCCLosDOC

Powder River Update Cc a phone call yesterday from Jerry Shrader at CMS regarding the Powder River Gas Gathering Project He informed me that the members of Fort Union would like to undertake an expansion of the facility While the members are unanimous in their desire to undertake this expansion there is a concern among some of them whether i the consent of the lenders and the administrative agent is required and ii the expansion might cause a default under the financing documents In light of these concerns Jerry contacted me and asked that we review the relevant documents Please feel free to call me at if you have any questions or if I can be of further assistance Sean

Powder River Update Cc a phone call yesterday from Jerry Shrader at CMS regarding the Powder River Gas Gathering Project He informed me that the members of Fort Union would like to undertake an expansion of the facility While the members are unanimous in their desire to undertake this expansion there is a concern among some of them whether i the consent of the lenders and the administrative agent is required and ii the expansion might cause a default under the financing documents In light of these concerns Jerry contacted me and asked that we review the relevant documents Please feel free to call me at if you have any questions or if I can be of further assistance Sean
